headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' www.googletagmanager.com www.google-analytics.com 'unsafe-inline'; connect-src 'self' www.google-analytics.com *.google-analytics.com *.analytics.google.com *.g.doubleclick.net; img-src 'self' data:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' fonts.gstatic.com;
